SELECT ma.`name` as `name`, SUM(IF(b.`buyer_level` = 52, 1, 0)) AS normalGrade, SUM(IF(b.`buyer_level` = 53, 1, 0)) AS topGrade FROM `erui_buyer`.`buyer` b INNER JOIN erui_operation.market_area_country mac ON mac.country_bn = b.country_bn INNER JOIN erui_operation.market_area ma ON mac.market_area_bn = ma.bn WHERE b.deleted_flag = 'N' AND ma.deleted_flag = 'N' AND b.created_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND ma.lang = 'zh' AND ((b.`deleted_flag` = 'N') OR (b.`deleted_flag` = 'N' AND b.`source` = 1 AND b.`buyer_code` IS NOT NULL AND b.`buyer_code` <> '')) GROUP BY ma.`name` ORDER BY SUM(IF(b.`buyer_level` = 52 OR b.`buyer_level` = 53, 1, 0))
DESC
